import React ,{useState} from 'react' import { AccountBox } from '../Account' import Cart from '../Cart' import { XIcon } from '@heroicons/react/outline' import { useCart, useCartUpdate, useCartOpen} from '../../Contexts/CartContext' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Textfield from '../FormComponents/textfield' function Checkout() { const products = useCart() const CartUpdate = useCartUpdate() let total=0; products.forEach(element => { total+=parseInt(element.price) }); const RemoveProduct = CartUpdate.RemoveProduct const [Promo, setPromo] = useState('') return (
